title: The Whisper Net
outcome: Citizens abandon official BCI-driven systems, forming encrypted peer-to-peer networks to self-organize essential services. Council attempts crackdown, but loses further influence. Parallel orders emerge as public trust in BCI collapses, shifting actual power onto the streets.

events.description: Encrypted peer-to-peer 'whisper' networks rapidly spread. Citizens coordinate medical, food, and transport logistics outside BCI oversight.
Council authorizes a digital crackdown, but their orders are widely ignored. BCI metrics slip as official channels empty and reports go unfiled.
Essential services run on whisper-net organization; BCI scoring loses relevance as residents depend on word-of-mouth trust.
Conflicting authorities spark disputes—two neighborhoods openly reject Council guidelines, citing broader community support.
Council authority barely registers in daily life; the BCI becomes symbolic only. Citizens debate permanent independence, further eroding centralized control.
